trans-unit.source: Represents a window class in an application manifest.
trans-unit.target: 代表應用程式資訊清單中的視窗類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the class.
trans-unit.target: 類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the internal window class name that is used in registration contains the version of the assembly that contains the window class.
trans-unit.target: 控制註冊時使用的內部視窗類別名稱是否包含含有視窗類別的組件版本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass" /> class, specifying information about the versioning status of the window class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass" /> 類別的新執行個體，並指定視窗類別的版本控制狀態。

trans-unit.source: The `versioned` parameter controls whether the internal window class name that is used in registration contains the version of the assembly that contains the window class.
trans-unit.target: `versioned`參數會控制註冊時使用的內部視窗類別名稱是否包含含有視窗類別的組件的版本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute can be `yes` or `no`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值可以是`yes`或`no`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `yes`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `yes`。

trans-unit.source: The value `no` should be used only if the same window class is defined by a side-by-side component and an equivalent non-side-by-side component and you want to treat them as the same window class.
trans-unit.target: 值`no`-並存元件和對等的非---並存元件所定義相同的視窗類別，而且您想要將它們視為相同的視窗類別時，才應該使用。

trans-unit.source: Note that the usual rules about window class registration apply: only the first component that registers the window class will be able to register it, because it does not have a version applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，套用的視窗類別註冊的一般規則： 僅註冊視窗類別的第一個元件將無法進行註冊，因為它不能套用至它的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the window class.
trans-unit.target: 取得視窗類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the window class.
trans-unit.target: 視窗類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that controls whether the internal window class name that is used in registration contains the version of the assembly that contains the window class.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值控制註冊時使用的內部視窗類別名稱是否包含含有視窗類別的組件版本。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="yes" /> if the name that is used in registration contains the version of the assembly; otherwise, <see langword="no" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在註冊時使用的名稱包含組件版本，則為 <see langword="yes" />，否則為 <see langword="no" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="yes" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="yes" />。

trans-unit.source: This property controls whether the internal window class name that is used in registration contains the version of the assembly that contains the window class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會控制註冊時使用的內部視窗類別名稱是否包含含有視窗類別的組件的版本。

trans-unit.source: The value of this attribute can be `yes` or `no`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值可以是`yes`或`no`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `yes`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `yes`。

trans-unit.source: The value `no` should be used only if the same window class is defined by a side-by-side component and an equivalent non-side-by-side component and you want to treat them as the same window class.
trans-unit.target: 值`no`-並存元件和對等的非---並存元件所定義相同的視窗類別，而且您想要將它們視為相同的視窗類別時，才應該使用。

trans-unit.source: Note that the usual rules about window class registration apply: only the first component that registers the window class will be able to register it, because it does not have a version applied to it.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，套用的視窗類別註冊的一般規則： 僅註冊視窗類別的第一個元件將無法進行註冊，因為它不能套用至它的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Name" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Name" /> 屬性序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Name" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Versioned" /> property to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定屬性，這個屬性用來將 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Versioned" /> 屬性序列化為 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Versioned" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.WindowClass.Versioned" /> 屬性的值。
